p: Discarded perfume lemon and leaves ( Citrus limon (L.) Burm. F. Appraised by Professor Junxia Zheng of Guangdong University of Technology) were obtained from the local farm (Xinghong farm, Enping, Jiangmen, Gaungdong, China). Mueller-Hinton agar (MHA) and Mueller-Hinton broth (MHB) were purchased from Guangdong Huankai Microbial Technology Co., Ltd. (Guangdong, China), custom alkanes solution of C 8-C 40 n-alkanes standard (Reagent Brand: o2si) was bought from ANPEL Laboratory Technologies (Shanghai, China). Deltamethrin was purchased as analytical reagent from J&K Scientific (Beijing, China). ( R)-(+)-Limonene and citronellal were purchased from Aladdin chemical company (Shanghai, China). Other reagents were obtained as analytical reagents from Tansoole (Shanghai, China).
